abstract: A study from the United Nations Environment Program calls for a reconsideration of current biofuel mandates.
snippet: A study from the United Nations Environment Program calls for a reconsideration of current biofuel mandates.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations Environmental Program has added to the growing biofuels debate with the release of a wide ranging assessment of the environmental impacts of crop-based fuels.

headline.main: U.N. Study Urges Caution on Biofuels
